channel.title: 工具 on 停云霭霭，时雨濛濛
channel.description: Recent content in 工具 on 停云霭霭，时雨濛濛

item.title: Hugo+Github搭建Blog
item.description: 安装Hugo 1 brew install Hugo 新建Hugo项目 1 2 hugo new site blog cd blog 选择主题 1 2 3 git clone https://github.com/xianmin/hugo-theme-jane.git --depth=1 themes/jane cp -r themes/jane/exampleSite/content ./ cp themes/jane/exampleSite/config.toml ./ 添加新文章 1 hugo new posts/first-post.md 本地测试 1 hugo server 打开 http://
